keyTakeAways: A 23-year-old Philadelphia woman, Kada Scott, went missing after her last known activity on October 4, 2025.
Human remains of an unidentified female were found in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school in a wooded area, two weeks after her disappearance.
Police believe the remains may belong to Kada Scott, and the medical examiner is investigating to confirm identity.
A man named Keon King, 21, was arrested and charged with Scott’s kidnapping and with a prior kidnapping case involving a woman he knew personally, suggesting a pattern of behavior.
Tracking of phone communications led investigators to Keon King, who was the last known person in contact with Scott.
A specific anonymous tip led authorities to the shallow grave and to the discovery of the remains, highlighting the importance of public tips.
A gold 1999 Toyota Camry linked to King was found in an apartment complex parking lot based on a tip, and is now under investigation as possibly being connected to Scott’s disappearance.
The Philadelphia Police Department and FBI’s Violent Crime Task Force are jointly investigating the case, indicating its seriousness and national level attention.
King’s prior case involving kidnapping and assault was refiled after a witness failed to appear in court, showing a history of unresolved criminal activity.
The case is being investigated for a potential pattern of behavior, with King now facing charges in two separate kidnapping cases.

summaryOfNewsArticle: A 23-year-old Philadelphia woman, Kada Scott, went missing on October 4, 2025, after disconnecting from her phone and social media after leaving work. Two weeks later, human remains of an unidentified female were discovered in a shallow grave behind an abandoned school, prompting officials to suspect they may belong to Scott. Police believe Keon King, a 21-year-old man previously charged with a similar kidnapping case, is responsible, as he was the last person in contact with her and has a history of violent behavior. Investigators used phone tracking to identify King and received a crucial anonymous tip that led to both the grave and the car linked to him. The case is now under joint investigation by the Philadelphia Police Department and the FBI’s Violent Crime Task Force. Authorities are examining King’s prior case, which was refiled after a witness failed to appear, and are exploring a potential pattern of criminal behavior. The family, especially Scott’s parents, are calling on the public to provide information, and the medical examiner is currently assessing whether the remains belong to Kada Scott.
title: Police Investigate Disappearance of Philadelphia Woman; Remains Found in Shallow Grave After Anonymous Tip
